image1.title: Batman Begins
image1.text: It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.

image2.title: Batman Begins
image2.text: Patients suffering delusional episodes often focus their paranoia on an external tormentor usually one conforming to Jungian archetypes. In this case, a scarecrow.

image3.title: Batman Begins
image3.text: If you make yourself more than just a man. If you devote yourself to an ideal. You'll become something else entirely.

image4.title: Batman Begins
image4.text: I wouldn't presume to tell you what to do with your past, sir. Just know that there are those of us who care about what you do with your future.
